title: Stepping Out of the Cave
description: 2013-01-16 - Stepping Out of the Cave - If we are suffering it is because we are believing something that is not true.  This talk explores the genesis of our core beliefs and the investigation, mindfulness and compassion that can release their grip. Please support this podcast by donating at www.tarabrach.com or www.imcw.org. Your donations allow us to continue to freely offer the teachings!
